page.title: 09Governing Steeple Claydon
page.content: There are{4 tiers of government applying to the area,Parish Council, District Council,County Council and Parliament.We propose to describe the functions of the Parish Council as this is pertinent to the area. The{Parish Council}has 9 members elected by their fellow parishioners for a 4 year term of office.The Council meets on a monthly basis in the Committee Room of the Village Hall.Sub-committees run the{Hall}and {Recreation Ground}which are owned and maintained by local fund raising in the main.The{Parish Clerk}is rseponsible for the considerable paperwork and financial matters involved.The Council has an over-view on{Planning Applications}but its views need not be heeded by the District Council and often are not!
